attributes.action: Restart the school academic year September 2021
attributes.additional_details: Children have missed out on school and nursery time due to the lasting impact of covid-19 which we have been living with for almost a whole year. Nursery children will not be ready to start school in September due to nursery closures/ covid restrictions and lockdown and missing out on normal childhood and relationships.
attributes.background:
Restart the school academic year 

For government to increase the school starting age, or give current students the opportunity to retake the current school year, or both.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/566160
